com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Interface ActivityController.EscapeToRedirector

  • Enclosing class:
    ActivityController
    Deprecated. 
    now use the ActivityController.EscapeToRedirectorAnnotation annotation instead

    @Deprecated
public static interface ActivityController.EscapeToRedirector
    An empty interface which should be used as a marker on an Activity, which does not want to be requested by the ActivityController.Redirector.

    When an Activity implements this interface, the ActivityController.Redirector.getRedirection(Activity) method will not be invoked.

    Since:
    2012.04.11
    See Also:
    ActivityController.needsRedirection(Activity), ActivityController.EscapeToRedirectorAnnotation
